item.description:
Runtime: 1 hrs 30 min. | Rated PG SF action.
Description: Veteran-turned-mercenary Thoorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to China. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.
Director: Vin Diesel, Michelle Yeoh, MÃ©lanie Thierry, Lambert Wilson, Mark Strong
Starring: Anthony Daniels, Matthew Wood, etc.
Genre: Science Fiction, Spy
Reviews:
Trailer: <xobject width="425" height="344"><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/JyhEHKB6cmY&hl=en" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="344" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
Notes: Please do not RSVP YES if you do not intend to come. Yes is not a MAYBE. If you can't figure out what you are going to do in the future, please do not burden us with that. Please buy your tix [b]AHEAD[/b] of time! I'm going to watch this regardless of people coming, but it will more fun with people.
How to find me: I"ll be wearing my trademark green hat+Meetup logo+my screename JediFonger in front as usual. If it's upstairs, I'll be in front of the coffee house next to the windows, near the metal seat+tables. If it's downstairs, I'll be in front of the popcorn stand behind the rope.
[b]The movie begins@7:50PM. I'll be there @7:20PM and we'll go into the theater@7:40PM. Please be prompt =D.[/b]
item.how_to_find_us: I"ll be wearing my trademark green trucker hat w/my screename JediFonger+meetup
item.name: Babylon A.D.
